'''Mark Poole''' (born [[31 August]] [[1963]]) is an American fantasy artist, known for being one of the original illustrators for [[Magic: The Gathering]]. He was contracted by [[Iron Crown Enterprises]] to create artwork for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]].

Poole works with oil, acrylic and digital media.<ref name=CCGA>{{CCGA|entry=Poole, Mark R.}}, pp. 209-210</ref>
==Career==
After graduating from the University of South Carolina with a degree in fine arts and design in 1986, he worked as an illustrator for advertising and merchandise. By the early 1990s, he had transitioned to fantasy work.<ref name=CCGA/>
